quotes.text: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
quotes.author: Stephen McCranie

quotes.text: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.text: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.text: Worrying is like a rocking chair, it gives you something to do but never gets you anywhere.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.text: If you want to conquer the anxiety of life, live in the moment, live in the breath.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.text: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: What a wonderful thought it is that some of the best days of our lives haven't happened yet.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.text: Knowing how to be solitary is central to the art of loving. When we can be alone, we can be with others without using them as a means of escape.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.text: I restore myself when I'm alone.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.text: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: The deeper that sorrow carves into your being, the more joy you can contain.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: Music was my refuge. I could crawl into the space between the notes and curl my back to loneliness.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: If you can't fly then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.text: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

songs.text: Listen to 'Breathe Me' by Sia - A song about vulnerability and asking for help
songs.title: Breathe Me

songs.text: Play 'Three Little Birds' by Bob Marley - Everything's gonna be alright
songs.title: Three Little Birds

songs.text: Listen to 'Unwritten' by Natasha Bedingfield - Today is where your book begins
songs.title: Unwritten

songs.text: Play 'Brave' by Sara Bareilles - Say what you wanna say and let the words fall out
songs.title: Brave

songs.text: Listen to 'The Middle' by Jimmy Eat World - It just takes some time
songs.title: The Middle

songs.text: Play 'Stronger' by Kelly Clarkson - What doesn't kill you makes you stronger
songs.title: Stronger

songs.text: Listen to 'Good Life' by OneRepublic - Celebrate the moment you're in
songs.title: Good Life

songs.text: Play 'Rise Up' by Andra Day - I'll rise up, in spite of the ache
songs.title: Rise Up

songs.text: Listen to 'Weightless' by Marconi Union - Scientifically designed to reduce anxiety by 65%
songs.title: Weightless

songs.text: Play 'River' by Yiruma - Gentle piano melody that mirrors natural breathing patterns
songs.title: River

songs.text: Listen to 'Fight Song' by Rachel Platten - Empowering anthem about taking back control
songs.title: Fight Song

songs.text: Play 'You Are Not Alone' by Michael Jackson - Direct message of connection and companionship
songs.title: You Are Not Alone

songs.text: Listen to 'Happy' by Pharrell Williams - Infectious celebration of joy and positivity
songs.title: Happy

songs.text: Play 'Roar' by Katy Perry - Motivational anthem about finding inner strength
songs.title: Roar

songs.text: Listen to 'Titanium' by David Guetta ft. Sia - Powerful declaration of unbreakable inner strength
songs.title: Titanium
